channel.title: Platforms on Eclipse Mita

item.title: XDK110
item.description: Overview: The XDK110 The Bosch Cross Domain Development Kit (XDK) is a programmable sensor device for building IoT applications. It contains a wide range of sensors and means of connectivity and is extensible using its extension bus. Due to its versatility it also serves as reference platform for Mita. To learn more about the XDK head over to http://xdk.io. Implemented System Resources Currently implemented sensors, connectivities and buses in the XDK110 platform:
